- *"Some months have 31 days; how many have 28?"*

**Thought Process:**

“Thirty days hath September,  
April, June, and November;  
All the rest have thirty-one,  
Except February alone...”

**Reflection:**  
This supports the idea that **all months have at least 28 days**. The rhyme confirms it.

Yup, this makes sense. **All months meet the 28-day minimum**.
